text: niyata vasayenma api musata ek dharmayak di tibunemu. (mema kuranayehi movun matabheda æti kara ganna akarayatama) ehida ovun matabheda æti kara gatha. (ovun danduvam at kara ganna kalaya viniscaya dinadi yayi) obage deviyange poronduva kalinma æti vuve nætinam, (melovadima) movunge karanava avasan vannata ida tibuni. niyata vasayenma (makkavasin vana) movunda (mema kuranaya gæna avul sahagata) sækayehi sitinnaha
